Recommendations: encourage a wider participation of bs entrepreneurship students in various co curricular learning opportunities for their envisioned total development
specific guidelines for feasibility study report and business implementation should be formulated reviewed and implemented
more vigorous and sustained efforts are desired for the improvement of the entrepreneurship laboratory center
documents should be properly labeled by the proper authorities and be properly bound

instructional materials with isbn numbers or copyrights can be developed by faculty a formal arrangement regarding the development and reproduction of instructional materials should be entered into between the university and the faculty authors specifying among others what royalties are to be generated
allocate budget to sustain the reproduction and distribution of student handbook especially to incoming freshmen to familiarize them with college life at mmsu
strengthen teachers capacity and students outcome through advance trainings seminars and further studies
